TitleEnglish: Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Beginning of a New Era
SummaryEnglish: The film follows Jungle Pocket, who wishes to participate in the Triple Crown Classic race, which can only be run once in a lifetime. She faces rivals Agnes Tachyon and Manhattan Cafe.
Aliases: Umamusume Pretty Derby : Shinjidai no Tobira
Umamusume Puritī Dābī: Shinjidai no Tobira
Uma Musume Puritī Dābī: Shinjidai no Tobira
Uma Musume: Pretty Derby - Beginning of a New Era
